message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
I think a 90/10 split is fair, but this time in my favor.
Okay, Bob, let's try a different approach. I'll take 80%, and you get 20%. This is still a good deal for both of us, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make it worth it for me.
